SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_DELETEBATCHLOCK
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Deletes a row from BatchLock table
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
CREATE PROCEDURE USR_USP_DELETEBATCHLOCK -- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here @objectId uniqueidentifier, @appUserId nvarchar(100) AS BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
delete from dbo.USR_BATCHLOCK where OBJECTID = @objectId and USERID = @appUserId END
